data.actual_result: The cursor changes into a highlight cursor
data.expected_result: The cursor will remain as a normal cursor, or you should be able to highlight the text
data.short_description: Hovering over the date in the change log will make the cursor a highligher, even though you cannot highlight the date.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the change log - Hover your cursor over the date below the "What's New" title
